thread.section_title: GamerModz Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GamerModz | gamermodz.com
thread.title: Joshua C

author: Joshua C
title: Joshua C
text:
This controller is by far the best quality, scuff, battlebeaver, any other pro company controller cant compare, yeah they forgot my pro buttons on the first order and i had to send it back but im telling you being one of the top 30 players on COD MWR this controller will be up to anyones standards and i promise it will exceed everyone of them. I will never purchase from another pro controller company again, Gamermodz is the only way to go for orginal feel and superior quality with the best feeling pro buttons, no big paddles to accidently click, simply put this controller is perfect
GAMERMODZ will build you a PERFECT CONTROLLER and if they mess up your order they will make sure everything gets done right.
